thread.title: Q&A: What Machines Can Learn From People And We Can Learn From Them - WGBH
thread.title_full: Q&A: What Machines Can Learn From People And We Can Learn From Them - WGBH - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: WGBH
title: Q&A: What Machines Can Learn From People And We Can Learn From Them - WGBH
text:
Guruduth Banavar is an executive at IBM leading the team developing a new generation of cognitive systems - don't call it artificial intelligence - known as Watson. Watson, of course, is the supercomputer most famous for its victory against two men on Jeopardy! in 2011.
 WGBH.
